body_html: This is somewhat expected as the current design goes. TensorFlow allocates 95% of all the memory upon initialization. Also the initializer copies a const value to GPU, in addition to the actual variable storage, for the actual assignment to happen. That's why can only have slightly less than 1/2 of the GPU memory for a single variable.
